          <language>en</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Criteria - Task 1 (Literature)</string>
            <string language="en">Criteria - Task 1 (Literature)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kriterien - Aufgabe 1 (Literatur)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des critères - Chargez 1 
(littérature)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Critérios - Tarefa 1 (Literatura)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Test di verifica - Operazione 1 (Letteratura)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κριτήρια - στοιχειώδης εργασία 1 (λογοτεχνία)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Criterios - Tarea 1 (Literatura)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Your task is to write a well-organized essay in which you evaluate a book of your choice in regard to three criteria for great literature.Module 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
            <string language="en">Your task ice to write a well-organized essay in which you evaluate a nest okay of your choice in regard to three criteria traveled great literature.

Module 5 - Literature.

English C.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">English C</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>
            <string language="sv">reading</string>
            <string language="sv">listening</string>
            <string language="sv">writing</string>
            <string language="sv">speaking</string>
            <string language="sv">literature</string>
            <string language="sv">essay</string>
            <string language="sv">great literature</string>
            <string language="en">English C</string>
            <string language="en">english</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="en">listening</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="en">speaking</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="en">essay</string>
            <string language="en">great literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihr Aufgabeeis, zum eines gut-organisierten 
Versuchs zu schreiben, in dem Sie ein Nest-O.K. Ihrer Wahl 
hinsichtlich drei Kriterien reisten großes literature.Module 5 
auswerten - Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Votre chargez la glace pour écrire un 
essai bien-organisé dans lequel vous évaluez un ok d'emboîtement de
votre choix en vue de trois critères avez voyagé grand 
literature.Module 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seu gelo da tarefa para escrever um essay 
bem-organizado em que você avalía uma aprovação do ninho de sua 
escolha com respeito a três critérios viajou literature.Module 
grande 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il vostro ghiaccio di operazione per scrivere un 
saggio bene-organizzato in cui valutate un'approvazione del nido della
vostra scelta rispetto a tre test di verifica avete viaggiato 
literature.Module grande 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο στοιχειώδης πάγος σας για να γράψει ένα 
καλά-οργανωμένο δοκίμιο στο οποίο αξιολογείτε μια φωλιά ο.κ. της
επιλογής σας όσον αφορά τρία κριτήρια ταξίδεψε τη μεγάλη 
ενότητα 5 λογοτεχνίας - λογοτεχνία αγγλικό γ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Su hielo de la tarea para escribir un ensayo 
bien-ordenado en el cual usted evalúa una autorización de la 
jerarquía de su opción en vista de tres criterios viajó gran 
literature.Module 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
